wrestler:MultiGrappleRelic.NAME: MultiGrappleRelic
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, Apply 1 Grapple to each enemy.

wrestler:VoidMaskRelic.NAME: Void Mask
wrestler:VoidMaskRelic.FLAVOR: The secret to the Wrestler's unusual techniques.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, discard 1 card from your draw pile.
